response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a remarkable opportunity for you to acquire a high-impact asset at a price that is higher than its intrinsic value to you but still within a reasonable range for such a valuable item. I trust that this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your financial planning. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
